announcements.title: The Cathedral will resume regular Mass Schedule as of February 16th, 2021. Mass times below.
announcements.descriptive:
Due to Covid-19, we will be resuming our previous Mass Schedule at 30% capacity.
Our schedule will continue to be updated.

Parishioners are asked to review
[Worship Safe in Pictures and Points](http://peterboroughdiocese.org/en/resourcesGe…).

The televised Sunday Mass will continue on YouTube.
Check [Special events](#schedule2) below for information and links.

announcements.title: Daily Lenten Reflection
announcements.subtitle: March 4, 2021
announcements.descriptive:
A Powerful Contrast
Reflect, today, upon that which you desire in life. Too often, the deception of material wealth and worldly possessions dominate our desires.

In fact, even those who have little can easily become consumed with these unhealthy desires. Seek, instead, to desire only that which is eternal. Desire love of God and love of neighbor.

Make this your only goal in life and you, too, will be carried away by angels when your life is completed.
Let us Pray…

My Lord of true riches, You chose to be poor in this world as a sign to us that true riches come not with material wealth but with love. Help me to love You, my God, with all my being and to love others as You love them.

May I be wise enough to make spiritual riches my single goal in life so that these riches will be enjoyed for all eternity. - Fr. Joshy George
